entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 06:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.1°C
Pressure: 104.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -36.5°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4 except minus 16 over northern sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4 except minus 16 over northern sections. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
